channel.title: Tech Transfer | Wei-Cheng Wang's Personal Website

item.title: Real-time Video Synopsis System - From Algorithm to Industry Deployment
item.description:
Bridging the gap between research and industry.

Co-developed an intelligent visual surveillance module with industry partner EverSTek, translating a theoretical Event-based Video Synopsis algorithm (published in MVA'17) into a deployable C++ solution.

This system condenses hours of surveillance footage into minutes, enabling rapid event screening and tracking. The prototype demonstrated real-time performance on edge devices and won the Merit Award at the International APICTA Awards (Asia Pacific Information and Communications Technology Alliance), recognizing its innovation and commercial potential.

(Details to be followed)
